name: 資訊管理
goals: 協助學生瞭解資訊科技於各管理領域之運用，進而熟悉如何利用資訊科技提升企業營運整體成效
希望藉由小組討論培養學生合作學習的能力
透過個案討論，讓學生將資訊科技與組織決策、行銷、顧客關係管理、生產製造、供應鏈等知識加以融會貫通
syllabus:
【teaching arrangement：16+2 weeks】

Flexible teaching arrangement: Make an appointment with the teacher within the first 8 weeks to discuss the content of the final group presentation.

Week 1  Course Introduction

Week 2  Chapter 1: The Importance of MIS

Week 3  Public holiday

Week 4  Chapter 2: Business Process, Information System, and Information

Week 5  Chapter 3: Organizational Strategy, Information Systems, and Competitive Advantage

Week 6  Chapter 4: Hardware and Software

Week 7  \[Guest Lecture\] Taiwanese Language and Information System

Week 8  Mid-term Exam

Week 9  Chapter 5: The Cloud

Week 10  Chapter 7: Organizations and Information Systems

Week 11  \[Guest Lecture\] IT Governance

Week 12  Chapter 11 and 12: Information Systems Management and Development

Week 13  Chapter 9: Business Intelligence

Week 14  Final Report Presentation (1)

Week 15 Final Report Presentation (2)

Week 16  Final Exam

methodologies.note: Main topics are provided by the teacher in advance every week, and students are asked to preview the textbook and discuss in class.
Conduct relevant case discussions with students based on the course content
Cultivate the ability to share information technology knowledge with the public through group presentation
Use short videos to share and discuss the latest technology and knowledge with students

grading.note: Students are required to participate in the discussion based on the course content

prerequisite: ◎Unavailable for M.A. program students (M.A. program courses excepted) and B.A. program students.
